name: Eternity (AntiFifa Game Studio, drilima, debsdev, Bianca Nascimento, IHarvestBrains)
name_original: Eternity (AntiFifa Game Studio, drilima, debsdev, Bianca Nascimento, IHarvestBrains)
description:
Ione finds a mysterious cave and now needs your help to discover and leave. Explore, find new friends and follow Ione as she finds her inner light.

CONTROLS

W, A, S, D and directional arrows - move

HOW TO PLAY

Extract the file and run the "lasco" file.
